bill_title: establish certain policies related to teacher staff reduction and recall.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain policies related to teacher staff reduction and recall. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-43 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Each school board shall establish a written policy for teacher reduction and recall. The policy shall include: (1) Circumstances that will initiate a staff reduction; (2) Time lines and procedures for notifying staff of a layoff; (3) Due process procedures for staff notified of a layoff; (4) Objective criteria to determine which staff are to be laid off; (5) Opportunities afforded the public and staff to present alternatives before the implementation of the reduction; (6) Procedures for recall of laid off staff; and (7) Maintenance of benefits during layoff. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
